src/lib/components/DashParticles.react.j.description:
DashParticles is a Dash component that renders interactive particle animations.
This implementation uses vanilla tsParticles for better compatibility with Dash.

id.description: The ID used to identify this component in Dash callbacks.

options.description:
Configuration options for the particles.
See https://particles.js.org for documentation on available options.

height.description: Height of the particles container. Can be any valid CSS dimension value.

width.description: Width of the particles container. Can be any valid CSS dimension value.

className.description: Additional CSS class for the container div.

style.description: Additional inline styles for the container div.

particlesLoaded.description:
Boolean flag indicating if particles have been loaded.
This is a read-only prop updated by the component.

setProps.description:
Dash-assigned callback that should be called to report property changes
to Dash, to make them available for callbacks.
